name: Under Defeat
description: Experience a unique and thrilling vertical shoot'em up that puts you in the cockpit of a powerful attack helicopter during an alternate WWII timeline. Known for its gritty graphics, precise controls, and challenging gameplay, 'Under Defeat' offers intense action with stunning attention to detail. Choose between ground-targeting or aerial-focused weaponry, face relentless enemies, and take down massive bosses. Features high replay value with different strategies to master, and a gripping atmosphere that keeps players engaged.
